content: The crocheted Tetris pillow is shown here in the shape of the useful, yet infuriating, step-shaped Tetris piece. This piece could be guided on top of Tetris protrusions of any size. Guide it to the side of your sofa and either pummel it or cuddle it, depending on your mood.

Become the picture of pure evil after donning the Borderland Psycho Bandit mask at the next convention. The mask portrays the demented psycho bandit and features amazing attention to detail in addition to LED eyes that enhance the menacing appeal.

The perfect couch for any aspiring vampire, this coffin couch features a plush violet interior and a hardwood exterior. It folds away for day time rest, and opens up at night when its owner goes on the prowl. This sofa gives any apartment an Addams family vibe.

With the peanut butter and jelly pillows you can finally enjoy a tasty snack without worrying about adding extra junk in the trunk. These scrumptious looking pillows are so comfy and plump, we’re willing to bet you’ll enjoy them even more than a real PB&J sandwich.

Just one morsel of the Star Wars chocolate is enough to send you flying with ecstasy to Tatooine’s second sun. Meticulously crafted by an expert chocolatier, these delicious treats feature all the classic shapes and characters like R2-D2 and the evil Darth Vader.

Make a splash at the next ball as you promenade into the room with the majestic swan wig. It’s woven from a blend of fine silk, alpaca, and adorned with pearls to make this Elizabethan inspired masterpiece a must-have for any <del>worst</del> best dressed list.

Eat your precious baby up just like you want to with the shark attack sleeping bag. This sleeping bag is the perfect gift for a new parent with a sense of humor — just slip the bag over baby’s legs, and it’s perfect for the stroller and just as cute as can be.

Add some excitement to the living room by sitting in front of these Couch Fighter wall decals and conjure some hadokens while you battle with your couchmate. You can take on a new identity every time you sit by the decal, and will be perfecting ultra combos in no time.

Level up your collection of geeky jewelry with one of these nostalgic Nintendo cartridge rings. Available in a variety of styles – including the legendary gold Zelda cartridge – these highly detailed rings are the perfect gift idea for the old school gamer.

The floppy disk notebook makes use of the floppy disk that got you started in your computing life. Two floppy disks encase a useful ruled notebook that can store all of your secrets. The notebook has just about as much storage as a single floppy disk, too.

Contact the unknown without drawing attention from the feds when wearing the E.T. ring. The ring’s accurate portrayal of E.T. will satisfy even the most hardcore movie fan while its antiquated copper finish make it great for all occasions, from formal events to phoning home.

Celebrate your greater piratey nature with the octopus ear cuff. The ear cuff is made of antiqued bronze, and each tentacle is exquisitely handcrafted. Requiring no piercings to be worn, this ear cuff is the perfect maritime jewelry piece.

Stop wasting precious energy using your facial muscles to express your perplexed look of disapproval – now you can simply wear these glasses and sport a disapproving face all day long! These reactionary emoticon inspired glasses are a must have for neckbeards.

Keep warm without losing the menacing appeal you’ve worked so hard to acquire with the crocheted Bane mask. It’s the one of a kind hand-knit piece of winter wear guaranteed to keep you safe and cozy whether you’re terrorizing Gotham or skiing down the slopes.

Take the law into your own hands with this replica Judge Dredd ‘Lawgiver’ gun. This incredibly detailed replica prop is designed to look just like it did in the comic book and movie, and is guaranteed to make punks show you some respect on the street.

Form truly meets function with this beautiful steampunk wireless wrist keyboard. This hand made keyboard will make you feel like a mad Steampunk genius typing away wireless commands to your giant metal Spider machine as you wreak havoc on your enemies.

Keep track of your offspring’s growth spurts with this oversized ruler growth chart. This cleverly designed piece will replace those ugly pencil marks on your walls with a gigantic and beautiful hand painted and hand distressed ruler that will add character to any kid’s room.

With these horror movie lawn gnomes you can finally hang out with your old pals Freddy, Jason, and Michael without fear of ending up in the city morgue. These meticulously decorated gnomes provide curb appeal and keep those annoying neighbors away.

Now you can increase your productivity from 0 to 60 in a matter of seconds when you use the Corvette desk to complete your work assignments. This devilishly sexy desk features a handmade design and paint job detailed enough to rival an actual Corvette.

You don’t have to be from Mordor, or even a LOTR fan to enjoy the delicious Eye of Sauron lollipops. These custom made treats feature an all-knowing, captivating eye design encased in dark sugar and covered with a clear coating that places the eye on display.

Get behind the steering wheel and experience the most thrilling and interactive race of your gaming career with the video game bumper car steering wheel. This re-purposed bumper car integrates high-tech specs into the retro frame to take racing games to new levels.

Introduce your newborn to the greatest trilogy ever made with the Star Wars baby crib mobile. Featuring miniature aircraft like the X-Wing and Millennium Falcon, your baby will be transported to a galaxy so far, far away that they might actually sleep soundly for once.

Show your guests how twisted you really are with the scary monster lightswitch cover. Whether you’re decorating a mad geneticist’s lab, grossing out your friends, or just getting into the spirit of Halloween, these creepy light switch covers are sure to add a bold look.

Let the piranha coffee mug help you begin your workday with the same aggressive go-get-em attitude they’ll demonstrate upon seeing you enter into their territory.  Hand carved with extreme attention to detail, this coffee mug is ideal for drinking your morning cup of Joe.

Scare your way into the hearts of friends and family by surprising them with the mini chocolate skulls. Available in either milk, dark, or white chocolate, these bite sizes skulls contain a delicious walnut/candy brain and make great treats for the Halloween season.

No gift will satisfy the intellectual handyman quite like the hardware chess set. This custom set features creatively designed pieces made entirely out of various nuts and bolts, all anxiously waiting to strategically fight on the custom painted 8″ x 8″ battleground.

Save the galaxy while simultaneously rewarding your taste buds by licking these savory Death Star lollipops. These hand-made intergalactic lollipops feature a smooth surface and intricate detailing guaranteed to satisfy the sweet tooth of any Star Wars fan.

If you’ve ever wanted to cover yourself in concrete spikes, you finally can when you purchase the spikey vest. This spikey vest is covered in hand-crafted, pastel-toned concrete spikes, and it is guaranteed to make you look like a creature from the blimey deep.

Who says jewelry can’t also be practical? The multi-tool utility ring is the ultimate fashion accessory for the MacGyver-like handyman who likes to always be prepared for any situation. It’s just like having a Swiss army knife on your ring finger.

Don’t let “fear of labels” stop you from being romantic on Valentine’s Day. With the “It’s Complicated” Valentine’s Day card, you can show that <del>special someone</del> friend that you are thinking about them, but it’s totally not a big deal or anything. Whatever.

Turtle power! With these Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles hat no one will ever question why you skateboard through feces infested sewer tunnels or why enjoy showering yourself in green chemical waste. These convertible TMNT hats are also available in multiple colors.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Moon Pillow
content: The moon can be extremely fickle. Luckily, with the glow in the dark moon pillow you’ll be able to enjoy a full moon no matter what the lunar cycle may indicate. Once the lights go off, the life-like image on the pillow begins to emit a soothing glow that lulls you to sleep.

It may be impossible to get your hands on Mario’s magic shrooms but with the Super Mario piranha plant pipe in your hands you’ll be able to soar just as high. This quality pipe features a one-of-a-kind design and double blown Pyrex glass for maximum durability.

Introducing the Yoda hoodie. Half Jedi robe, half Jedi master, and all around awesome. This one of a kind custom made hoodie provides a relaxed, comfortable fit and features an intricately designed hood that will have you looking like the great Yoda.

Declare your undying love to the entire galaxy using the Stars Wars wedding rings. When exchanging vows with your Princess, there’s no better  way to show off your geeky love than by giving each other these tasteful and totally epic silver wedding bands.

Broadcast your love for old school cinema by toting around the audio reel to reel bag. This custom bag features intricate detailing for enhanced authenticity and is made from 100% Spanish wool so it’s lightweight and even water resistant.

Redefine what fine jewelry means with the turntable ring. This unnecessarily gaudy piece of flare will allow you to flaunt your excessive wealth like never before with an 18k gold frame and black diamond turntable guaranteed to get you noticed by all the ladies.

Add a bit of old world mysticism to any room with the ancient ruins terrarium. This hand-carved wonder resembles an artifact you’d find while exploring through the most remote parts of the planet – the stoic stone deity peers into your room, and your soul!

There she blows… your nose. The whale tissue cover can be placed over any existing tissue box in order to add a bit of whimsy to any bathroom decor. During flu season there’s no better companion to have by your side when you come down with a case of the sniffles.

Nothing’s quite as effective as the Gameboy soap bar for removing all the grime and sweat that result after an arduous day of gaming. This awesome soap bar will take you on a nostalgic ride that leaves you feeling and smelling springtime fresh.

Sharks are known for having the ability to devour virtually anything – even dirty laundry – which is why the shark laundry basket makes an awesome addition to any bedroom. Just make sure to watch out for the deadly jaws when dropping in your dirty clothes.

Make your home look a little more seasick with the curvy bookshelf, the bookshelf that makes your living room into a veritable Salvador Dali painting. These bookshelves are handcrafted of hard wood, and will hold your books up straight while giving your eyes a treat.

You might want a steam-powered watch to match your top hat made of gears, but this steampunk watch is going to match your get-up even better. As a bonus, you won’t burn your wrist with steam, and you’ll be able to tell time when you’re cleaning your goggles.

Decorate your library with these unique folded book paper art. With a bold 3D look, these sculptures are crafted by folding the pages from actual books into legible words of your choosing. They make an excellent gift idea for book lovers and librarians.

These gold-plated space invader earrings are laser-etched to look just like the space invaders you used to try and shoot up in the arcades. These little dudes won’t be trying to invade, and you won’t be trying to shoot them — but they will look great on your ears.

Cuddle up with your favorite city symbol, the NYC manhole cover pillow. You might not have thought of the manhole cover as especially cuddly, but this one is fluffy and cushy as well as stylish. And it doesn’t belie a festering sewer full of run-off, so that’s a bonus.

Keep your dice games honest with these precision machined dice. Guaranteed to have a perfect balance in each set, these dice come in a variety of precision machined metals. From aluminum to stainless steel to titanium, these perfectly crafted dice are for serious players.

These unique guitar picks are fashioned out of real quarters featuring none other than the first President of the United States of ‘Murica. George Washington cannot tell a lie, but he can melt your face off when his face is properly attached to set of electric guitar strings.

Experience the displeasure of living in a world of stubborn anger with the grumpy cat hat. Inspired by the grumpy cat internet meme, this handcrafted fleece hat will keep you warm in the cold wintery months, and is sure to get you a few real life upvotes.

Make your bathroom cool again with the skateboard vanity light, the light that makes you yearn for your rebellious kick-flipping days again. Fortunately for you, skating has always been cool, and still is, so this light will look super retro-chic in your apartment.

Immortalize yourself in LEGO form with these personalized LEGO portraits. If you’ve ever wondered what you’d look like in LEGO form, now is your chance to make it a reality as your submitted photo will be beautifully drawn into a LEGO’ized version.

Make your next tea party a little more interesting with sugar cube skulls, the sugar cubes that come in the shape of a dried out human skull. These skull cubes will sweeten your tea, give your guests a fright, and will look lovely next to your grandmother’s china.

The wearable planter necklace allows you to put a bit of greenery into your life, even if you live in a busy city and work in a parking garage. Plant a spring of lavender or lettuce in your necklace, and enjoy a fresh scent or a fresh snack whenever you need one.

Store your books, dvds, and other home paraphernalia on a bookshelf you deserve, but don’t need right now with this Batman bookshelf. With a Nolan Batman series inspired design of the bat symbol, this unique bookshelf is a must have home decor piece.

Charge your devices and give off some warm lighting in your home or office with this clever USB charger outlet lamp. Available in a several different colors, this unique forty watt lamp doubles as a electrical outlet and USB charger station.

Don’t let those delicious White Russians leave water stains on your tables – with The Big Lebowski coaster set you’ll have the Dude and company to protect your furniture from drink sweat. It’s the best coaster money can buy, but that’s just like our opinion, man.

Share something special with your best friend without being cliché – the peanut butter and jelly sandwich necklaces are a cute twist on the heart necklaces broken in half and worn between two good friends. Now all you have to figure out is are you a PB or J person.

After the wild success of the Harry Potter movies, the famous story of wizards and hobbits was turned into a book series which had moderate success. If you happen to be a fan of those books, you can now flaunt your love with these mini Harry Potter book charms.

Start coloring with the full power of the rainbow with these unique 7 colors in 1 rainbow pencils. Truly a pencil like you’ve never seen before, they were crafted out of magical unicorn blessed trees that are found only in the deepest recesses of rainbowland.

Laws are stupid. Updating your twitter every 18 seconds is far more important than driving responsibly on the road. And now with the iCrash steering wheel adapter you can tweet, check your Facebook news feed, and watch movies all at the same time. Smart!

Start your own fellowship with this hand knit Dwarven beard hat. Inspired by Gimli the dwarf warrior from Lord Of The Rings, this incredibly detailed fleece helm has a detachable beard, and for just three easy payments of $99.99 you can upgrade it to mithril!

Keep your braaaaaaiinnsss nice and warm with this cartoon zombie beanie. Hand knit from acrylic yarn, the zombie beanie looks like its gnawing down as your tasty cranium, and with its availability in multiple head sizes, it’s a great gift idea for zombie lovers of all ages.

Show off your iPhone’s darker side with the steampunk iPhone dock. Complete with gears and aged metalwork, the dock will charge your phone and connect it to the vintage earpiece. Stop lamenting how modern your phone looks — steampunk it!

Add some zombie flair to your library with these zombie hand bookmarks. With zombie hands in your favorite book, you’ll never feel alone again. Ditch those boring kitten bookmarks and stick a pair of zombie hands in your first edition of World War Z.

Nintendo Cartridge earrings are the accessory that lets your mates know that you’re a child of the 80s and 90s. These earrings, in the exact shape of cartridges featuring Super Mario Brothers 2 and 3, are each less than an inch wide.

Add some unique eco-friendly lighting to your home with this recycled camera owl lamp. This wise looking owl lamp features a variety of recycled camera parts to give it a quirky and lovable design that is guaranteed to be your favorite lamp in your home.

If AK-47s are too bold for your liking, why not scale down to some lovely pistol lamps? These handmade 9mm pistol lamps are cast in ceramic plaster molds and come complete with the black shades – making these pistol lamps an excellent lighting fixture for a gun nut’s home.

Read your children a bedtime story like never before with this clever bedtime story blanket. Ideal for the lover of good books, the bedtime story blanket features a few pages of literature for you to read as you cuddle up and get ready for a good night’s rest.

The only 100% way to ensure your teens never catch bed bugs is to never let them have sleep. But with rap music and that satanic music television sending subliminal messages, the most realistic approach to keeping them safe is to give them these condom pillows.

No true Trekkie’s home should be without this amazing Starship Enterprise coffee table. Handcrafted by wood artist Barry Shields, this Enterprise ship features beautifully crafted lines using a combination of cherry, ash, and poplar wood. You’ll never get laid again, guaranteed!

Give that special someone a heart necklace that they won’t find cliche and cheesy with this pixelated heart necklace. Able to be broken in half – perhaps symbolically – the pixelated heart necklace is an excellent gift idea for geeky jewelery collectors.

Decorate your bathroom with the greatest plumber you’ll ever know with the Super Mario Bros toilet seat. This hand painted toilet seat depicts the classic Super Mario tearing it up in the nostalgic 1-1 level, and comes triple layered in polyurethane to protect the paint.

Have the friendliest ghost in New York City hang out in your home with this Ghostbusters Slimer sculpture. This incredibly detailed Slimer sculpture is made from a strong silicone rubber, and when hung on your wall it gives the appearance that he is bursting out!

You’re more than just a wizard, Harry – you’re a fashionista! With these clever Harry Potter glasses rings you can look good while showing off your geeky Potter side. Available in three bold colors, the Harry Potter glasses rings are a great gift idea for Harry Potter fans.

Give yourself some direction in life by adding the nautical compass wall decal to your home. With its ability to always point you in the right direction, the nautical compass wall decal will give you a truly centered feeling in your own home.

Don’t cower in fear of the Empire – now you can be prepared to defend yourself against stormtroopers, Boba Fett, or even Darth Vader with these collectible Star Wars villains targets. These geeky silhouette targets/posters are the perfect gift idea for the vigilant Rebel.

Fans of the Legend of Zelda will find these eight-bit earrings to be the perfect accessory. Honor the legendary video game with earrings designed to look exactly like the original little Link for the NES. You’ll be the coolest fangirl in Hyrule.

Enchant your fingers with these lovely octopus rings. Available in either sterling, yellow gold, or black powder coated, these octopus rings make an excellent gift idea for the collector of unique jewelry and those intrigued by the captivating cephalopod.

You might be broke in the real world, but you can be rich in the land of Hyrule with these over-sized Zelda rupee pillows. You won’t need to chop down any grass or smash any local vendor jars to get your hands on these colorful rupees, all you need is your credit card!

The groom almost got away, but the zombie bridge always get her prey! These zombie bride wedding cake toppers are perfect for a zombie lover’s wedding, foreshadowing the boring zombie like life you’ll soon have once you get married.

Glorify your home with the shining light that only Iron Man can bestow upon you with this unbelievable Iron Man stained glass. Featuring 334 pieces of glass, this incredibly detailed Iron Man stained glass is a true collector’s piece for any geek.

This is the Droid you’ve been looking for – the R2-D2 baby costume is perfect for baby geeks, offering a Star Wars themed onesie and a matching hat. It’s also available in a gown style, as well as a toddler sized version, so you can decorate your offspring for years to come.

Go all out at your next DJ gig with this replica Deadmau5 LED helmet. This fully functional Deadmau5 helmet contains 168 programmable LEDs so you create any type animation style desired or even have it react to the music that is playing.

Give your light switches at home a creative twist with these kooky toggle light switches. These fully functional light switches use gears and leverage to turn on and off your lights, and are a perfect gift idea for an engineer’s home or office.

Harness the raw power of a rainbow farting Pop Tart cat flying through outer space with this Nyan Cat necklace. Perfect for youtube geeks and internet meme collectors, the Nyan Cat necklace is a handmade clay piece, so each necklace is unique.

Stop dressing up in lame cliche costumes every Halloween – this year you can go as the scariest dinosaur ever with this life size baby T-Rex costume! Though your legs might be visible during day time, at night this incredibly realistic T-Rex costume will fool everyone!

Add some nostalgic decor to your home with this melted Army men bowl. This clever bowl features three different colored Army men of various poses, melted down into a functional yet decorative storage bowl that will be an instant conversation piece in any home.

Just when you thought it was safe to go back into the water with a ukulele – the great white king of the seas returns. This Jaws shark attack ukulele is a custom built maple instrument that will strike fear into the hearts of your former band mates who replaced you with a guitarist.

Dogs and mailmen might hate each other, but now you can help bridge their differences with this Beagle dog mailbox. This adorable doggy mailbox is shaped and painted like a Beagle, and is a perfect gift idea to personalize a dog lover’s home.

Give your home library an industrial feel to it with this plumbing pipes bookshelf. Using real industrial pipes, this unique bookshelf will give your home a rugged yet modern look and will provide storage space in even the tightest of spaces.

Give your child a cute and original costume this Halloween with the eggs and bacon kid’s costume. Featuring a tasty bacon hat and a sunny side up torso, these adorable fleece costumes will make your kid look so cute you’ll want to just eat him/her up, literally.

For the first time ever you can own a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles ooze canister and transform your boring pet turtles into pizza eating crime fighters! These replica Ninja Turtle ooze canisters are made from real glass and metal, and are great for TMNT fans.

Do you love bacon so much that you’d wear it as clothing? Well now you can do just that without the weird looks and attacks from hungry animals with the bacon tie. This delicious looking bacon tie is hand painted and will clog your arteries with style!

Enhance your pathetic skin and bones with impressive metal with these mechanical hands. Perfect for mad scientists, street fighters, and people who dream of replacing their bone with metal, these fully functional mechanical hands will make you a force to be reckoned with.

Show off your vast riches while staying comfy with these hundred dollar stack pillows. At sixty five dollars each, these unique dollar stacks pillows have a respectable US dollar to comfy pillow conversion rate, and are perfect for flaunting your riches off to guests.

Give a mind blowing performance to the entire Mushroom Kingdom and turn yourself into a Princess Peach panty dropper with this Super Mario guitar. These custom made, hand crafted, and air brushed Super Mario themed guitars are perfect for the geeky musician.

Keep your hands feeling fresh by washing them with severed fingers! These creepy yet realistic looking human fingers are actually mini soap bars with a wonderful watermelon scent added to them. These severed fingers soap bars go great with serial killer wallpaper, too!

Despite the best efforts of the DEA, the purest form of crystal meth available – known as the blue stuff – can now be purchased on the web. This crystal meth rock candy is perfect for fans of Breaking Bad, or just as a gag gift for hard drug addicts.

Make your kid look like a creative soldier of fortune with this crayon ammo bandolier. Perfect for carrying around a large selection of crayons, this nifty crayon bandolier comes in a variety of colors and will ensure your child never gets beat up in school.

Show off your geeky side with these mini video game controller rings. Available in XBox360, PS3, and even Nintendo Wii style, as well as in a variety of colors, these mini video game controller rings are the perfect gift idea for that special gamer in your life.
